<S%H6258>'Now<s%> then <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H4100>"Why<s%> are you <S%H6213>doing<s%> <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H9567>harm<s%> to <S%H5315>yourselves,<s%> so as to <S%H3772>cut<s%> <S%H3772>off<s%> from you <S%H376>man<s%> and <S%H802>woman,<s%> <S%H5768>child<s%> and <S%H3243>infant,<s%> from <S%H8432>among<s%> <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> <S%H3498>leaving<s%> yourselves <S%H1115>without<s%> <S%H7611>remnant,<s%>

<S%H3651>"Therefore<s%> <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H2009>'Behold,<s%> I am going to <S%H7760>set<s%> My <S%H6440>face<s%> against you for <S%H9567>woe,<s%> even to <S%H3772>cut<s%> <S%H3772>off<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3063>Judah.<s%>

<S%H3651>"Nevertheless<s%> <S%H8085>hear<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3063>Judah<s%> who are <S%H3427>living<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> <S%H2009>'Behold,<s%> I have <S%H7650>sworn<s%> by My <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H8034>name,<s%>' <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> <S%H518>'never<s%> shall My <S%H8034>name<s%> be <S%H2142>invoked<s%> <S%H5750>again<s%> by the <S%H6310>mouth<s%> of <S%H3605>any<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> in <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> "As the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God<s%> <S%H2416>lives.<s%> "

<S%H3541>"Thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> <S%H2009>'Behold,<s%> I am going to <S%H5414>give<s%> over <S%H6548>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H6548>Hophra<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> to the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of his <S%H340>enemies,<s%> to the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of those who <S%H1245>seek<s%> his <S%H5315>life,<s%> <S%H9201>just<s%> as I <S%H5414>gave<s%> over <S%H6667>Zedekiah<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> to the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H5019>Nebuchadnezzar<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon,<s%> [who was] his <S%H340>enemy<s%> and was <S%H1245>seeking<s%> his <S%H5315>life.<s%>'"
